description: This selection procedure is for the acquisition of translation services for the Translation Bureau, from English to French in the field of    General and Administrative Texts. ## Tenders Details

### Notice Announcement

* Title (English/French): Translation Services / Services de traduction
* Reference Number: PW-ZF-524-41252
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: EP745-231596/A
* Publication Date: December 6, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 15, 2022, at 14:00:00

### Details of the Tenders

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (Région de la capitale nationale)
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada)

### Description of the Requirement

* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien)
* Tendering Procedures: Qualification on the Permanent List or Meeting of Qualification Requirements
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal
* Type of Requirement: Supply Arrangement (AMA) for Translation Services
* Detailed Requirements:
	+ Translation services from English to French
	+ Field: General and Administrative Texts
	+ Volume: Up to 8,800,000 words distributed over a period of 2 years, with optional 1-year extension
	+Bid Solicitation: EP745-231596/A will be sent to the pre-qualified suppliers on the permanent list or who meet qualification requirements

### Respondents and Requirements

* A list of eligible suppliers has been identified and has been sent an invitation to submit a proposal.
* Suppliers must have qualification on the Tier 3 level in the field of General and Administrative Texts, from English to French, in accordance with the conditions of SA EN966-140305.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Officer: Mongeon, Anick
* Email: anick.mongeon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: 873 354-4883
* Address: Les Terrasses de la Chaudière, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.
